timeline.message: Update go-petstore-withxml with new generateInterfaces option

timeline.bodyText: I didn't see any reason this repeated the setWithXml from the previous line, so I think this was a bug.
timeline.author: arvindth

replies.bodyText:
Yeah, apparently this was just previously running this twice:
verify(clientCodegen).setWithXml(true);
replies.author: jimschubert

timeline.message: Update go-petstore-withxml with new generateInterfaces option

Add new generateInterfaces option for go-experimental

  * Samples now contain interfaces, using backward incompatible method
    signatures.
  * Add one test for mocked methods

bin/go-experimental-petstore.sh fixes
debug ensure-up-to-date
debug ensure-up-to-date
more debug4, use latest mockgen

more debug5, use latest mockgen w/o version

Enable generateInterfaces for go-experimental samples

  * Samples now contain interfaces, using backward incompatible method
    signatures.
  * Add one test for mocked methods
  * Switch to go 1.14 for circleci to allow generating mocks

[Go]: Interface definitions for api functions

 * Fix #2294 with code suggested by @partkyle
Use interface in client struct
Fixups to align with current master
Replace classname with method name in method comments
Make method comments a bit prettier
Add commandline option to enable generateInterfaces

Update go-petstore & oa3/go-petstore samples with prettier comments

  - Use default generateInterfaces=false to suppress interfaces
Regenerate go-experimental/oas2 samples w/o interfaces
Enable generateInterfaces and update samples for go-petstore-withxml

Add generateInterfaces/prettier comments for go-experimental templates

  * Backward incompatible since it changes the api method
    signatures significantly.
  * Adheres to a builder pattern more strictly. Execute now runs on the
    req object returned by the builder, instead of the builder itself
  * Prettify/align method comments

Method signature refactors for go-experimental (and openapi3) samples

  * Also update to include prettier method comments

Enable generateInterfaces for go-experimental samples

  * Samples now contain interfaces, using backward incompatible method
    signatures.
  * Add one test for mocked methods
  * Switch to go 1.14 for circleci to allow generating mocks
Undo mock additions in CI/backward incompatibility in tests

Address PR comments: fix backward incompatibility in templates

  - add Execute redirection from request back up to service
